category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 2 (Effectiveness of resolutions at the general meeting)
contents: Article 2 (Effectiveness of resolutions of the general meeting) ① Resolutions of the board of directors or committees that are contrary to the resolutions of the general meeting of delegates (hereinafter referred to as *general meeting) are not effective. ② Executives must faithfully execute the resolutions of the general meeting.
